OrgName.entry: SHEFFIELD HALLAM UNIVERSITY INDOOR BOWLS LEAGUE

Desc.entry: Not-for-profit indoor bowls club for men, women, veterans and juniors.

ProvisionPlace.entry: Sheffield Hallam University Graham Solley Sports Development Centre

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Daily (Oct-Apr), Mon & Thurs 9.30am-4.30pm (Bowls League Oct-Apr), please contact for further details
